dcterms:creator: J. Gao
C. Sun
Z. Yang
R. Nevatia
dcterms:description: Charades-STA provides time-based annotations using a pre-defined set of activity classes and general video descriptions. It contains 12,408 training and 3,720 testing moment-query pairs, with videos averaging 31 seconds in length.
dcterms:title: Charades-STA

dcterms:creator: R. Krishna
K. Hata
F. Ren
L. Fei-Fei
J. C. Niebles
dcterms:description: ActivityNet Captions consists of 20,000 YouTube videos with an average length of 120 seconds. Each video contains temporally localized time intervals and sentence descriptions, averaging 3.65 intervals and 13.48 words per description.
dcterms:title: ActivityNet Captions

dcterms:creator: K. Zhou
J. Yang
C. C. Loy
Z. Liu
dcterms:description: YouCookII consists of 2,000 long untrimmed videos from 89 cooking recipes obtained from YouTube. Each cooking step is annotated with temporal boundaries and aligned with the corresponding section of the recipe.
dcterms:title: YouCookII
